I've looked through like every comment and I really think some of you haven't even played league... its so easy to understand the big blue swirly thing is the new skin release and the small pictures are SKINS THAT ARE ALREADY IN THE GAME. The new skin is obviously going to have some kind of link to the Mecha theme. Top left: Mecha Aatrox Top middle: Mecha Malphite Top right: Mecha Kha'zix. I don't know why you guys are finding it so difficult to understand....

Ok, for all you dumbasses that cant simply look at the images.
1st pic is Mecha Aatrox.
2nd pic is Mecha Malphite.
3rd pic is Mecha Kha'Zix.
So can you please stop saying random idiotic assumptions as to who you think the champions are in the previously stated pictures, its not hard.

People who say it ain't Sion:
His numbers are 00 meaning end/beginning which can relate to death or resurrection which is Sion's lore
"Crush Kill Destroy" is a sion quote itself
Also goes onto say that it is initiating self destruct mode and then rebooting which relates to Sion's passive/resurrection

Cannot be Hecarim for he just got a skin, same for Yasuo too even though he already has project yasuo which is close to mecha. I really doubt its Nautilus but I would love for it to be either, I'm also doubting it will be a blitz skin due do his somewhat recent Boss skin.{{champion:14}}
